steps.step1: We send affirmational messages direct to your Whatsapp.
steps.step2: The messages are sent twice a week, on Tuesdays and Saturdays.
steps.step3: If you change your mind, you can un-subscribe or resubscribe at any time.

subscribe-errors.internal: There was an error subscribing to Whatsapp. Try again later and <contactLink>message the Bloom team</contactLink> if you're still getting this error.
subscribe-errors.alreadyExists: A whatsapp subscription already exists for your user. Please <contactLink>message the Bloom team</contactLink> if you think this is an error.

unsubscribe-errors.internal: There was an error unsubscribing from Whatsapp. Try again later and <contactLink>message the Bloom team</contactLink> if you're still getting this error.
